Exaggerate: The claim that Sen. Kamala Harris is "supporting the animals of MS-13" is an exaggerated statement without sufficient evidence.
Lack enough support: The White House did not provide any evidence to support their claim against Sen. Kamala Harris.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Sen. Kamala Harris supports MS-13 without any evidence or basis.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim is part of a pattern of attacks by President Trump and his administration on Democrats over immigration enforcement and MS-13, suggesting that there may be alternative motives behind the claim.
